member.name: M:Capstone2.Auditing.Auditing.consoleAudit(Capstone2.Domain.Domain.Account,System.String)
member.summary: Prints the audit message to the default console output.

member.name: M:Capstone2.Auditing.Auditing.fileSystemAudit(Capstone2.Domain.Domain.Account,System.String)
member.summary: Registers the audinting message in a file. The directory will be one level above the executable's current location in the filesystem. The directory name is the name of the owner of the account.

member.name: T:Capstone2.Domain.Domain.Account
member.summary: The account associated with a customer.

member.name: T:Capstone2.Domain.Domain
member.summary: Type definitions that model the problem.

member.name: M:Capstone2.Operations.Operations.withdraw(System.Decimal,Capstone2.Domain.Domain.Account)
member.summary: Withdraws a certain amount from a given Account.

member.name: M:Capstone2.Operations.Operations.deposit(System.Decimal,Capstone2.Domain.Domain.Account)
member.summary: Deposits a certain amount into an Account.
